sentences.sContent: She was still only half awake when I brought her a cup of coffee.
sentences.sCn: 我给她端去咖啡的时候，她还是半睡半醒的样子。

sentences.sContent: How do you stay awake during boring lectures?
sentences.sCn: 听无聊的课你是怎样不让自己睡着的？

sentences.sContent: Emma lay awake half the night, worrying.
sentences.sCn: 埃玛忧心忡忡，半宿都没睡着。

sentences.sContent: The noise brought him wide awake (=  completely awake  ) .
To keep themselves awake (=  stop themselves from going to sleep  ) they sat on the floor and told each other stories.
sentences.sCn: 为了不让自己睡着，他们坐在地板上相互讲故事。

sentences.sContent: ...Curious if the left hemispheres were indeed remaining awake to process information detected in the surrounding environment...
...stay awake as long as you can...
...many students could hardly stay awake in his class without first drinking a cup of coffee...
...but I wish I could have stayed awake long enough to see the whole thing...

synos.tran: 觉醒，意识到；醒来；被唤起

trans.tranOther: to wake up, or to make someone wake up
